name: Gotham Gangsta | FPS vs VIVE | Local Multi-Player Bank Robbery
name_original: Gotham Gangsta | FPS vs VIVE | Local Multi-Player Bank Robbery
description: Gotham Gangsta!Exclusive FPS vs VIVE Asymmetric Multiplayer. One player uses the VIVE to rob banks - the other gets to be a cop to try and stop em'... with bullets!
